Package index

All functions

check_collinearity_with_time()
Check for collinearity between fixed effects and time variable
check_perfect_separation()
Check for perfect separation in categorical fixed effects
compute_p_values()
Compute p-values for each target_id
count_matrix_example
A small case-only count matrix to run light-weight examples
cpo_example
A fit CPAM object to run light-weight examples Six time points x 3 reps See cpo_example for fitted CPAM object. See exp_design_example for experimental design. #'
estimate_changepoint()
Use model selection to estimate changepoints
exp_design
Example Experimental Design
exp_design_example
An experimental design run light-weight examples Six time points x 3 reps #' See cpo_example for fitted CPAM object.
plot_cluster()
Plot clustered targets
plot_cpam()
Plot fitted changepoint additive models
plot_gene_co()
Plot a fitted cpgam (superseded)
prepare_cpam()
Prepare a cpam object
results()
Create a results table from a cpam object
select_shape()
Use model selection to select a shape for each target
summarise_bootstraps()
Summarize bootstrap samples
t2g
Transcript-to-Gene Mapping
ts_filter()
Removes lowly expressed genes
validate_fixed_effects()
Validate fixed effects formula against experimental design
visualize()
Launches a Shiny app to visualise the data and fitted models of a cpam object
